Translations.Text: Dang tamen tingjian songdu jiang shi shizhe de jingdian de shihou, ni kan tamen wei ziji suo renshi de zhenli er yanlei wangwang, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Women yi xindaole, qiu ni ba women tong zuozheng zhenli de ren jilu zai yi chu
Women shi qiewang women de zhu shi women yu shanliang de minzhong tong jin leyuan de, women zen neng bu xin an la he jiang shi women de zhenli ne!”
Yinwei tamen suo shuo dehua, an la yao yixia lin zhu he de leyuan baochou tamen, tamen de yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi xingshan zhe suode de baochou
Bu xindao erqie fouren wo de jixiang de ren, shi huo yu de jumin
Xindao de renmen a! An la yi zhunxu nimen xiangshou de jiamei de shiwu, nimen buyao ba ta dang zuo jinwu, nimen buyao guofen. An la dique bu xi'ai guofen de ren
Nimen dang chi an la suo gongji nimen de hefa er jiamei de shiwu, nimen dang jingwei nimen suo xinyang de an la

An la bu wei wuyi de shiyan er zebei nimen, que wei youyi de shiyan er zebei nimen. Pohuai shiyan de fajin, shi an ziji jiashu de zhongdeng shiliang, gongji shi ge pinmin yi can de kouliang, huo yi yifu zengsong tamen, huo shifang yige nuli. Wuli jipin huo shi nu de ren, dang zhaijie san ri. Zhe shi nimen fashi hou pohuai shiyan shi de fajin. Nimen yingdang xinshou ziji de shiyan. An la wei nimen ruci chanming ta de jixiang, yibian nimen ganxie ta
